entry.title: MyACC
entry.content:
The self service product for injuried New Zealanders to access support with ACC.
As the UX/UI Designer I am responsible for the discovery and design of new features, and provide on-going support for the development phase.
entry.summary: The self service product for injuried New Zealanders to access support with ACC.

entry.title: Tūī
entry.content: A digital drawing made in Krita in 2020
entry.summary: A digital drawing made in Krita in 2020

entry.title: Ginkaku-ji
entry.content: A digital drawing of Ginkaku-ji, The Silver Pavilion, in Kyoto Japan.

entry.title: Demon Slayer - Nezuko fan art
entry.content: A digital drawing made in Krita from the Anime “Demon Slayer”
entry.summary: A digital drawing made in Krita from the Anime “Demon Slayer”

entry.title: Nature Space
entry.content: Nature Space was funded by the New Zealand department of conservation to connect different conservation groups accross New Zealand. I was the designer on a refresh of the website, and also worked as the front end developer to implement the design changes to the Drupal 7 site.
entry.summary: Nature Space was funded by the New Zealand department of conservation to connect different conservation groups accross New Zealand. I was the designer on a refresh of the website, and also worked as the front end developer to implement the design changes to the Drupal 7 site.

entry.title: Opal3
entry.content: A reporting tool for business and government. I was the designer on a refresh of the website, and also built the front-end Opal3 website using Drupal.
entry.summary: A reporting tool for business and government. I was the designer on a refresh of the website, and also built the front-end Opal3 website using Drupal.

entry.title: NZCER
entry.content: The New Zealand Council for Educational Research. I worked as the designer and front end developer to update the website and provide a robust design system for their online catalogue. It was one of my first projects to design and implement a design system back in late 2016.
entry.summary: The New Zealand Council for Educational Research. I worked as the designer and front end developer to update the website and provide a robust design system for their online catalogue. It was one of my first projects to design and implement a design system back in late 2016.

entry.title: Young Enterprise Scheme Poster
entry.content: A poster design to demonstrate an agile workflow for a startup company
entry.summary: A poster design to demonstrate an agile workflow for a startup company

entry.title: Inverted World book cover
entry.content: Is a science-fiction novel by Christopher Priest. I was inspired to design my own version of the cover from the story.
entry.summary: Is a science-fiction novel by Christopher Priest. I was inspired to design my own version of the cover from the story.
